channel.title: RSS Feed!
channel.description: An open space to shed light on public & personal experiences of racial injustice, discuss, & reflect on the recognition of its impact on society.

item.title: A Reflection
item.description: This week I sat in so much contemplation asking myself an array of questions. Questions that honestly hurt...
item.dc:creator: Nicholas Joseph

item.title: 13th Facts and Takeaways
item.description: A visually, sonically, and emotionally engaging documentary that gives a substantial amount of insight into the many issues in the U.S. criminal justice system.
item.dc:creator: Hanako Ohashi

item.title: To Whom It May Concern:
item.description: Speak your truth, even if your voice shakes.
item.dc:creator: Speak Your Truth
